categories: Category:Star Wars: War of the Bounty Hunters

nodes.text: Bounty Hunters 15 is the upcoming fifteenth issue of the canon comic book series Star Wars: Bounty Hunters, and is part of the Star Wars: War of the Bounty Hunters event. The issue will be written by Ethan Sacks, illustrated by Paolo Villanelli, and published by Marvel Comics on August 4, 2021.
WAR OF THE BOUNTY HUNTERS: "THE GATHERING"
